books.title: Chapter I: My Childhood
books.image: images/0 -  trending on artstation Jesus gives sight to t.png
books.description: I was an ordinary yet spoiled young white american boy who had no real worries other than going through high school and not being good around girls and things of a very average variety. I was okay at sports and once I gained confidence I was okay with girl as well, even to the point that one was just not enough, so I cheated.

books.title: Chapter II: There Were Signs
books.image: images/0 -  trending on artstation Jesus gives sight to t.png
books.description: I was always pretty selfish if I am being honest with myself. Not in a way that people could abviously tell... but in a very coniving and sneaky way, the way that no one else will know that it is even benefitting me and maybe it even makes me look like I AM the one who is sacrificing...I would never have passed that opportunity up. Like I was saying, I was beyond selfish, solely self-seeking I would even say. Pretty dark, it makes me emotional even thinking about it. I hurt many undeserving people and for this I am sorry

books.title: Chapter III: What happened
books.image: images/0 -  trending on artstation Jesus gives sight to t.png
books.description: Throughout the years of teen to adulthood I lost my father and Brother in a matter of 6 years and went through 4 years in the Marine Corps in between....An affinity for alcohol was nearly essential for this predicament in my immature mind, that was that and it was off to even more...and more kept getting more expensive, and the consequences mounted and grew ever increasingly hopeless and dark and helpless.

books.title: As of October 21st 2024
books.image: images/0 -  trending on artstation Jesus gives sight to t.png
books.description: I am working diligently to make this the story that God deserves to have here and will be inputting it as it is given to me by His spirit.
